text: Table 1 Types of urgentsurgery suitable for day case procedures. General surgery Gynaecology Trauma Maxillofacial Incision and drainage of abscess Evacuation of retained products Tendon repair MUA fractured nose of conception Laparoscopic cholecystectomy Laparoscopic ectopic pregnancy MUA of fracture Repair of fractured mandible Laparoscopic appendicectomy Plating of fractured bone Temporal artery biopsy MUA, manipulation under anaesthesia.
